column4: if your pci id is 11ab:1faa, then: grep 1faa /lib/modules/3.2.0-26-generic-pae/* ==> <nothing>, i.e. no drivers listed for it
i havent installed ubuntu yet, I am making sure I don't need ndiswrapper on a flash drive before I install
yes, I understand. You can check the pci id from the windows device manager
